name: WWI: The First DogFighters
description:
WWI: The First DogFighters is a single-player game. This is a game of the shoot 'em up genre that goes on during World War I.

Game developed in collaboration with Fernando Nigro, Jaelcio Dutra and Marcelo Chaves. All are students of Digital Games, at the Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais, located in Brazil.

The WWI: The First DogFighters game received the "Best Soundtrack" award at the I Digital Games Festival PUC Minas 2017.

Check out our fanpage on Facebook.

Controls MovementShootGranadeShieldUltimate (Special)ArrowsHGFSpace
